message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,100,000.  It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to your company.  Let me know your thoughts!

Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $1,100,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. This is my best offer, as I'm aiming to stay within a specific budget.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $950,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000, which is a fair price considering the value you place on the product. This is a one-time offer, as I have another buyer ready to purchase at a higher price.  Let me know if you're interested.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $1,050,000 is still above my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $1,000,000, which is my absolute limit.  If this isn't acceptable, I'll have to look at other options. Let me know if you're willing to meet me at that price.
